Description: <o>Fire resistance</o> <y>-0.5% per charge</y>.<br3>Suffer <o>1 Fire damage per charge</o> at the <w>start of the turn</w>.
DescriptionExtended: <o>Fire resistance</o>  <y>-0.5% per charge</y>.<br3>Suffer <o>1 Fire damage per charge</o> at the <w>start of the turn</w>, then remove 1 charge.<br3>This damage <w>can be blocked</w> and is not affected by other modifiers.
